sentences.sContent: You’ll have to go now, otherwise you’ll miss your bus.
sentences.sCn: 你现在就得走，要不然就赶不上公共汽车了。

sentences.sContent: Put your coat on, otherwise you’ll get cold.
sentences.sCn: 穿上外套，不然你会着凉的。

sentences.sContent: ...she primed herself to new opportunities she may otherwise have overlooked...
...Some of us will seek it out; for others it will feel like an unwelcome intrusion into otherwise stable careers...

trans.tranOther: used when saying what bad thing will happen if something is not done
